RelatedSentence: Sonia Gandhi and her son Rahul on Monday offered to step down as leaders of India 's Congress party after it suffered its worst ever election defeat , but in a bid to snuff out dissent against the country 's leading political dynasty , party bosses declined .

Sonia Gandhi and her son Rahul on Monday offered to step down as leaders of India 's Congress party after it suffered its worst ever election defeat , but in a bid to snuff out dissent against the country 's leading political dynasty , party bosses declined .
The Congress , which has ruled India for most of its 67 years of independence including the last decade , is reeling from a humiliating reverse to bitter rival Narendra Modi and his BJP .

But rather than single out the Gandhis , who led a lacklustre campaign in the face of Modi 's barnstorming performance , Congress leaders facing at least five years in opposition rallied around the family .
